function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Propagation of contagious diseases through knowledge sharing","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and transmission","Mitigation":"Ensuring that information sharing platforms have robust verification processes and guidelines for information dissemination","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for secure information sharing, AI for content verification","People":"Researchers, medical professionals, and the general public","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Misinformation leading to incorrect treatment and drug development","Impact":"Ineffective treatment and potential harm to patients","Mitigation":"Implementing fact-checking processes and guidelines for information accuracy","Technologies":"AI and machine learning for content validation, natural language processing for information extraction","People":"Medical professionals, drug developers, and researchers","Owner":"Medical institutions, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Prediction of unknown side effects leading to unforeseen health risks","Impact":"Potential harm to individuals and public health","Mitigation":"Conducting rigorous testing and clinical trials for drug development, establishing stringent regulations for drug approval","Technologies":"Big data analysis, AI for predictive modeling, clinical trial management systems","People":"Regulatory bodies, drug developers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government agencies, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
